resources.string: Warning: One of the fields provided must be empty to display the result
Warning: No internet connection, please connect to the internet and try again
Warning: The "You send" field is filled incorrectly. It should be filled with non-negative numbers.
Warning: The "They receive" field is filled incorrectly. It should be filled with non-negative numbers
Warning: Both fields are empty. To proceed, please fill in at least one field and try again.
